msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The trunk now thinks it is Flex 4 rather than Flex 3.
The command-line tools report their version as "4.0.0 build NNNNN" because I updated FLEX_MAJOR_VERSION in VersionInfo.jara.
There is a new constant, VERSION_4_0, in the runtime FlexVersion class with the value 0x04000000, and CURRENT_VERSION is now this version.
The defaults.css for Flex 3's framework.swc has been renamed to defaults-3.0.0.css. The 'version' style in defaults.css now has the value "4.0.0".
The VERSION constant included into component classes is now "4.0.0.0".
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fix mxmlc compiler message. The version is now reported as "3.0.0" instead of "3.0". The flex version written to swc files is also updated.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fix the build field of the ProductInfo record in a swf generated by an official build.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The beginning of the open-source Flex SDK.
Populated the flex/sdk/trunk directory with an open-source subset of files from //depot/flex/sdk/...@191097 in the Faramir Perforce server. This changelist is a bit past the 3.0rc0 build.
The Ant scripts will not successfully build yet. They need to be adapted to the open-source subset.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Remove the license file, fds.sif, and hard-code true for the license checks.  At some point all the license code should be stripped out.
